DATED MATERIAL, SUBJECT TO CHANGE. PLEASE CONSULT CURRENT UCSD GENERAL CATALOG FOR ANY ADDITIONAL INFORMATION.


The USP major is an interdisciplinary social science major that will give a variety of perspectives for understanding the development, growth, and culture of cities. Select courses that focus on the field that most interests you: urban planning, policy, social services, health care, environment, education, economic development, or community diversity. For more information please visit usp.ucsd.edu.
